hobbies.name: Drawing
hobbies.description: I like drawing because I enjoy making projects that remind me of things that I have had the pleasure of experiencing in my life.
hobbies.brief: Drawing is a good mode of relaxation for me.

hobbies.name: Reading
hobbies.description: I enjoy reading because it allows me to experience fantasy worlds that I otherwise would never be able to.
hobbies.brief: Reading is eye-opening for me in various ways.

hobbies.name: Gaming
hobbies.description: The feeling of making progress through my own efforts as well as being able to live through a story is what amkes gaming enjoyable for me.
hobbies.brief: Games absorb me and do not let go.

hobbies.name: Cricket
hobbies.description: Cricket- bowling especially, helps me forget my worries temporarily.
hobbies.brief: Cricket is my second favourite sport.
